topics.body:
"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5410ee8b6368721df1620100#post_5410ee8b6368721df1620100
Lies mostly.
My main problem with it aside from the shitty characters and creepy shotacon pandering is the series lies. It sells itself as a _Shonen_ series but anyone with a frontal lobe can tell that it wasn't written for 10 to 18 year old males. It was written for creepy bishounen/shotacon obsessed teenage girls.

"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5410f1656368724e0d250000#post_5410f1656368724e0d250000
I remember seeing some trailers for it that played up the deal with the devil/awesome demon powers aspect of it so I was like "rock the fuck on, lets fucking do this!"

Then I watched about four episodes, desperate for it to start being crazy awesome and all I found was irritating fanservice, only one or two times when the butler murders the fuck out of people.

Yeeeah I can agree with that, I remember when fanservice wasn't overused.

Like, _almost_ every show has that now.

Things like Space Dandy in my opinion get away with it cuz of how the show is mosly comedy so that being there is just part of the silliness.

but fuck High School Of the Dead, Fuck that show to it core and burn it with acid and bleach and wear it down and turn it into toilet paper so I can wipe my black ass with it!
